faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

name.en: Chair of Programming Languages and Systems

structural_unit_name.en: Chair of Programming Languages and Systems

description.en: Algorithms and programs. Representations of algorithms, flow-charts. Branching algorithms. Loops. Sub-algorithms. Developing algorithms for given text-based problems. Program structure. Names. Variables. Operations. Expressions. Boolean expressions, comparisons. Conditional statements. Loop statements. Lists. Functions. User input. Reading from a file. Writing to a file. Simple user interface.
description.et:
Programmi ja algoritmi mõiste. Algoritmi esitusviisid, plokkskeemid. Hargnev algoritm. Tsükkel. Alamalgoritm. Tekstina püstitatud ülesande  algoritmi koostamine. Programmi struktuur. Nimed. Muutujad. Tehted. Avaldised.
Loogilised avaldised, võrdlemised. Tingimuslause. Tsükkel. Järjend. Järjendi läbivaatamine. Alamprogrammid. Andmevahetus kasutaja ja failidega. Lihtne kasutajaliides.

objectives.en: Student will acquire the basics of algorithmic thinking and get acquainted with some of the programming techniques.
objectives.et: Üliõpilane omandab algoritmilise mõtlemisviisi alused ja tutvub mõningate programmeerimisvõtetega.

learning_outcomes.en: - is motivated to use computers and to develop necessary programs for further studies;
learning_outcomes.et: - on motiveeritud kasutama arvutit ja koostama vajalikke programme oma edasise stuudiumi vältel;

learning_outcomes.en: - can demonstrate basic programming constructs (branching, loops, subprogram) as programming sections;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab programmeerimise baaskonstruktsioone (hargnemine, tsükkel, alamprogramm) esitada programmilõikudena;

learning_outcomes.en: - can develop algorithms for simple text-based problems.
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab tekstina püstitatud lihtsa ülesande realiseerida arvutiprogrammina.

notes.et:
See Moodle and course web page https://courses.cs.ut.ee

The course will be semi-structured. Some practical sessions will be online and others in-person. The course consists of reading materials in the Courses environment, video lectures of Charles Severance and practice sessions.

independent_work.et: Students have to read about the topic in Courses or watch a video lecture and solve a test before the practical session. There will be some exercises before and after the practical session. During the course students will also do a project.

description.et: Explanation of homework solutions and percentage of correct answers in tests
Correctness of the program, solution explanation
Percentage of correct answers and correctness of the program

grade_preconditions.et: There is no minimum amount of points required for the exam.

grade_evaluation.et: Homework has to be submitted on time. The final score will be made up of the sum of the points obtained in homeworks, practice sessions, project and exam.

name.en: Chair of Programming Languages and Systems
Chair of Programming Languages and Systems
Chair of Programming Languages and Systems
Chair of Programming Languages and Systems

audience.et: This course could be taken as elective for students of curricula outside of the Institute of Computer Science
